title: integrate with Guacamole database
author: Benchwork
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

-->

it would be fantastic if mRemoteNG could connect to the Guacamole database for connections and the like. we use it but still use mRemoteNG as my daily remote tool.
https://github.com/apache/incubator-guacamole-server

AI triage (gemini): Feature request to allow importing or syncing connections from Apache Guacamole's database, expanding supported connection sources.
